level.heading: Contributions to exploratory committees.
level.text: When an individual decides to run for office and becomes a candidate, contributions received during the exploratory period shall apply to the campaign contribution limits for the candidate as provided under ยง 1-1163.33.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-124
level.text: For history of Law 19-124, see notes under ยง 1-1161.01.
